author: dgraham
msg: Rewrote getArgs() method to use arrays and loops which considerably
decreased the length of the method.  This can improve even more when
commons-validator 1.1 is released because it unifies the Arg handling into
arrays instead of a limited number (4) of args.

author: dgraham
msg: Simplified constructors to all point to a common constructor.

author: dgraham
msg: Removed references to deprecated ApplicationConfig class.

author: dgraham
msg: Removed deprecated "application" methods in favor of "module" methods.
